_description: Side Panel Configuration. Controls the width and appearance of the library and blend mode side panels.

library._folderPanelWidthPercent: Width of the left folder panel as a percentage of screen width.
library._videoPanelWidthPercent: Width of the right video panel as a percentage of screen width.

blendModeSelector._panelWidthPercent: Width of the blend mode selector panel as a percentage of screen width.

_panelBackground: Background color for all side panels. Use rgba for transparency so video shows through.
